content: I gather, then, that we’ll hear from him about the faulty media, etc. etc. If the man is going to be President, I wish he’d keep his thoughts and actions until he is actually President!! He’s already taking credit for jobs that is due President Barack Obama, calling leaders of various foreign countries. Remember how he talks of interest in war, even nuclear? Perhaps he (other than George W. Bush’s later timing) will be the first new President to enter a war conceived and delivered by himself. Yay rah…ugh.
